mapper.select: select mi.logName as userName, mr.Gift_Amount as amount, mr.Receive_Date as recordDate from Member_Redpackets mr left join member_info mi on mi.member_id = mr.Member_id order by mr.Receive_Date desc

call grabRedPackage( #{mrId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{affairId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rdId, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{result, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
select RP_Detail_ID as rPDetailId, Affair_ID as affairId, Gift_Amount as giftAmount, Quantity as quantity, Remain_Quantity as remainQuantity from Redpackets_Detail_Record where Affair_ID = #{aid}

select Prize_ID as prizeId, Prize_Type as prizeType, Prize_Name as prizeName, Prize_Worth as prizeWorth, Prize_Quantity as prizeQuantity, Prize_Url as prizeUrl, Status as status from Prize_Information where Status = 1

select mi.Logname as memberName, pi.Prize_Name as prizeName from Lottery_Records lr left join member_info mi on lr.Member_ID = mi.member_id left join Prize_Information pi on pi.Prize_ID = lr.Prize_ID order by Lottery_Time desc
select Lottery_ID as lotteryId, Prize_ID as prizeId, Grade as grade, Grade_Odds as gradeOdds, Winning_Odds as winningOdds from Lottery_Manage where Lottery_ID = #{lid}
call( #{lrid, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lid, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pid, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mid, mode=IN, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{result, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
